body_html: I have the same problem on Windows with commit 10c29c8. I can workaround the problem by manually loading and unloading the caffe_gpu shared library with LoadLibrary and FreeLibray. My guess is that this has something to do with the static instance of CUDAContext getting destroyed at the wrong time when the program terminates.

body: I have the same problem on Windows with commit 10c29c8970a1468cd157d371a0d0b9879cb703a9. I can workaround the problem by manually loading and unloading the caffe_gpu shared library with  `LoadLibrary` and `FreeLibray`. My guess is that this has something to do with the static instance of `CUDAContext` getting destroyed at the wrong time when the program terminates.
